pageContext.claim: “.@Rasmussen_Poll just came out at 48% approval rate despite the constant and intense Fake News. Higher than Election Day and higher than President Obama. Rasmussen was one of the most accurate Election Day polls!”
pageContext.analysis: The Rasmussen presidential tracking poll did show Trump with a 48 percent approval rating on Aug. 31, but it appears to be an outlier, given the other polls show Trump at 40 percent or lower. While Rasmussen came close to predicting Hillary Clinton's margin of victory in the popular vote -- which Trump has disputed -- the poll also predicted Clinton would win the Electoral College vote.
